dialogues.dialogueText: Once upon a time, in a world just like yoursâ€¦
The world was overrun with large shadows, scary monsters, and danger at every corner.
People lost everything as the monsters overtook the world, fighting broke out among the survivors, and trust was all but gone.
People were in despair as there seemed to be absolutely no hope for humanity anymore.
Then, one day, the heavens opened up, and some very special girls were chosen to help bring the world back to order.
With their hard work, dedication, and kindness, the evil was banished- the world slowly healed again under their watch and care.
Now that the evil is gone and those girls have long since retired-
What do you do when you're given those same powers?
